Title: Banal
Writer: Cesar Apolinario (story), Mac Cruz (story), Cris Lim (screenplay), Cesar Apolinario (screenplay)
Actors: Christopher De Leon, Paolo Contis, Alfred Vargas, Cassandra Ponti
Plot: Cris and Jason are two policemen with two opposite personalities and philosophies-Cris is the epitome of the rare, near-extinct breed of honest cops while Jason is the basurero, the legman/...
